title: ERC721 Non-Fungible Token Standard basic implementation
name: ERC721BasicToken

inputs.name: _tokenId
inputs.description: uint256 ID of the token to query the approval of

abiDocs.name: getApproved
abiDocs.details: Gets the approved address for a token ID, or zero if no address set
abiDocs.return: address currently approved for the given token ID

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: address to be approved for the given token ID

inputs.name: _tokenId
inputs.description: uint256 ID of the token to be approved

abiDocs.name: approve
abiDocs.details: Approves another address to transfer the given token IDThe zero address indicates there is no approved address.There can only be one approved address per token at a given time.Can only be called by the token owner or an approved operator.

inputs.name: _from
inputs.description: current owner of the token

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: address to receive the ownership of the given token ID

inputs.name: _tokenId
inputs.description: uint256 ID of the token to be transferred

abiDocs.name: transferFrom
abiDocs.details: Transfers the ownership of a given token ID to another addressUsage of this method is discouraged, use `safeTransferFrom` whenever possibleRequires the msg sender to be the owner, approved, or operator

inputs.name: _from
inputs.description: current owner of the token

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: address to receive the ownership of the given token ID

inputs.name: _tokenId
inputs.description: uint256 ID of the token to be transferred

abiDocs.name: safeTransferFrom
abiDocs.details: Safely transfers the ownership of a given token ID to another addressIf the target address is a contract, it must implement `onERC721Received`, which is called upon a safe transfer, and return the magic value `bytes4(keccak256("onERC721Received(address,uint256,bytes)"))`; otherwise, the transfer is reverted.Requires the msg sender to be the owner, approved, or operator

inputs.name: _tokenId
inputs.description: uint256 ID of the token to query the existence of

abiDocs.name: exists
abiDocs.details: Returns whether the specified token exists

inputs.name: _tokenId
inputs.description: uint256 ID of the token to query the owner of

abiDocs.name: ownerOf
abiDocs.details: Gets the owner of the specified token ID
abiDocs.return: owner address currently marked as the owner of the given token ID

inputs.name: _owner
inputs.description: address to query the balance of

abiDocs.name: balanceOf
abiDocs.details: Gets the balance of the specified address
abiDocs.return: uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: operator address to set the approval

inputs.name: _approved
inputs.description: representing the status of the approval to be set

abiDocs.name: setApprovalForAll
abiDocs.details: Sets or unsets the approval of a given operatorAn operator is allowed to transfer all tokens of the sender on their behalf

inputs.name: _from
inputs.description: current owner of the token

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: address to receive the ownership of the given token ID

inputs.name: _tokenId
inputs.description: uint256 ID of the token to be transferred

inputs.name: _data
inputs.description: bytes data to send along with a safe transfer check

abiDocs.name: safeTransferFrom
abiDocs.details: Safely transfers the ownership of a given token ID to another addressIf the target address is a contract, it must implement `onERC721Received`, which is called upon a safe transfer, and return the magic value `bytes4(keccak256("onERC721Received(address,uint256,bytes)"))`; otherwise, the transfer is reverted.Requires the msg sender to be the owner, approved, or operator

inputs.name: _owner
inputs.description: owner address which you want to query the approval of

inputs.name: _operator
inputs.description: operator address which you want to query the approval of

abiDocs.name: isApprovedForAll
abiDocs.details: Tells whether an operator is approved by a given owner
abiDocs.return: bool whether the given operator is approved by the given owner
